name: Banana Slamma (agirlcea, es-arvind13, JhonGomez)
description:
DESCRIPTION

In this Infinite Runner Game, climb your way up the trees like a monkey trying to get some bananas. Avoid falling off the screen by jumping tree to tree to collect more bananas while avoiding obstacles. The player will need to react fast to keep the pace going if not… game over. 

CONTROLS

  • Spacebar
  • Spacebar
  • Spacebar

Just Spacebar :)

TEAM CREDITS - THE MONKEES
